short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A security scanner that scans the domain and server for vulnerabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome app is a security tool to find
 1. vulnerable plugins 
 2. ssl certificate validity
 3. All urls of the site
and provides a overall score for security.
